gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 125, Raptors 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Raptors, 125-103. Nikola Jovic recorded 22 points, five rebounds, and two assists for the Heat, with Jamie Jacquez Jr. adding 20 points, a career-high nine assists, and four rebounds in the victory. RJ Barrett tallied 35 points, 11 rebounds, and three assists for the Raptors in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 45-36, while the Raptors fall to 25-56.
